name: Hard Luck Hornswoggle
description:
Setting sail on a Friday is surely bad luck, but setting sail on Friday the 13th with a ship full of treasure is just asking for trouble. Defend your ship from the loot-hungry skeletons to hang onto what you rightfully took out of the hands of others.

Controls
Walk – Left/Right
Jump – Space
Attack – Z 

Credits
Art – @mojoe.art
Programming – @kevinthompson
